text: Anɨb ak mam ay sɨkop, yad God chɨnop mapen nɨgup agɨl, nɨbop kɨles gɨl agnɨŋɨd anɨb agebin. Mubwak gos tɨmud nɨbi ak dɨl, God nop pel tap sɨbog ñeb tek ñɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi God yɨl mɨdɨl ne agak tek nep kɨdek gɨl, tap anɨb anɨb gon nop tep gup agɨl gɨnɨmɨb. Pelpel anɨgɨpɨm ak, God nop kɨgom yɨmɨl nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agnepɨm.
